price: Ismaa’il, Yasa’iifi Zulkifliinis dubbadhu; (isaan) hunduu filatamtoota irraayi.
arabic: وَٱذۡكُرۡ إِسۡمَٰعِيلَ وَٱلۡيَسَعَ وَذَا ٱلۡكِفۡلِۖ وَكُلّٞ مِّنَ ٱلۡأَخۡيَارِ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: wa-udh'kur is'māʿīla wal-yasaʿa wadhā al-kif'li wakullun mina al-akhyāri
